backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three jar‑related UI fixes and their affected files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH variables for light/dark modes and core layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root container and loading the React main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manages navigation between pages including question, broken heart, confirmation, silver hearts, and fireworks.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedJar.tsx: Renders the clickable animated jar with lid, neck, body, and decorative heart chits.
frontend/src/components/CSSEnvelope.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHeart.ts: Floating heart component that renders animated hearts with randomized size, color, delay, and duration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and react‑query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styling, heart animations, and full jar CSS including body, neck, lid, and falling lid behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap that mounts React with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BrokenHeartPage.tsx: Displays a sad-themed page that fetches a random Giphy GIF and shows loading, error, or animated heart visuals.
frontend/src/pages/CelebrationPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ConfirmationPage.tsx: Renders a confirmation screen with animated hearts and a button that triggers a callback.
frontend/src/pages/FireworksPage.tsx: Generates and animates fireworks composed of particles, continuously spawning and removing them over time.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionPage.tsx: Shows a Valentine question with animated hearts and Yes/No buttons wired to callbacks.
frontend/src/pages/SilverHeartsPage.tsx: Manages an interactive jar animation that reveals romantic messages and eventually triggers a transition to fireworks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and typography with plugins and custom theming.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, known issue about the jar not being visible, and lists existing features and a new feature request related to fixing and improving the jar component.
